# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_library(libs-poco-JSON)


target_compile_options(libs-poco-JSON PRIVATE
  -DPOCO_ENABLE_CPP11
  -DPOCO_ENABLE_CPP14
  -DPOCO_NO_AUTOMATIC_LIBS
  -DPOCO_UNBUNDLED
  -DPOCO_OS_FAMILY_UNIX
  -DPOCO_NO_STAT64
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)

target_include_directories(libs-poco-JSON PUBLIC
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/JSON/include
)

target_include_directories(libs-poco-JSON PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/Foundation/include
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/JSON/src
)

target_link_libraries(libs-poco-JSON PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  libs-poco-Foundation
)

target_sources(libs-poco-JSON PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/JSON/src/Array.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/JSON/src/Handler.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/JSON/src/JSONException.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/JSON/src/Object.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/JSON/src/ParseHandler.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/JSON/src/Parser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/JSON/src/ParserImpl.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/JSON/src/PrintHandler.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/JSON/src/Query.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/JSON/src/Stringifier.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/JSON/src/Template.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/JSON/src/TemplateCache.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/JSON/src/pdjson.c
)
